body_html:
Have I written custom code: Yes

                dense = tf.sparse_tensor_to_dense(ws,name='dense')
                char_vec = tf.nn.embedding_lookup(embeddings, dense,name='embedded_lookup')
                # Output is Batch x  Max Words x Max Char x Char Feature Size

vs

                char_vec = tf.nn.embedding_lookup(embeddings, dense,name='embedded_lookup')
                # Output is Batch x  Max Words x Char Feature Size

I would like the output shape to be similar to the embedding lookup

Batch x Max Words x Max Char x Char Feature Size

TensorFlow installed from: pip install tensorflow
TensorFlow version: 1.9.0
Bazel version: Unknown

body:
Have I written custom code: Yes

>                     dense = tf.sparse_tensor_to_dense(ws,name='dense')
>                     char_vec = tf.nn.embedding_lookup(embeddings, dense,name='embedded_lookup')
>                     # Output is Batch x  Max Words x Max Char x Char Feature Size

`vs`

>                     char_vec = tf.nn.embedding_lookup(embeddings, dense,name='embedded_lookup')
>                     # Output is Batch x  Max Words x Char Feature Size

I would like the output shape to be similar to the embedding lookup

`Batch x  Max Words x Max Char x Char Feature Size`






OS Platform and Distribution: Windows
TensorFlow installed from: pip install tensorflow
TensorFlow version: 1.9.0
Bazel version: Unknown
CUDA/cuDNN version: NA
GPU model and memory: NA
Exact command to reproduce: NA
Mobile device: NA
